title: Swift
description: Swift is a powerful and intuitive programming language for iOS, macOS, and beyond.

snippets.Variables:
var x = 5  // Mutable
let y = 10  // Immutable
var name: String = "John"
var price: Double = 19.99
snippets.Dictionaries:
var ages = ["John": 30, "Alice": 25]
ages["Bob"] = 35
print(ages["John"]!)  // 30
ages.keys
ages.values
